doc.name: SliderSource
doc.description: The output of this actor is controlled by a slider in the run window. The range of the output is specified by two parameters, minimum and maximum. The type of these parameters and the output is integer.
doc.author: Xiaojun Liu, Gang Zhou
doc.property: The minimum value of the slider. The value must be an integer. The default value is -10.
The maximum value of the slider. The value must be an integer. The default value is 10.
The major tick spacing of the slider. The value must be an integer. The default value is 10.
The minor tick spacing of the slider. The value must be an integer. The default value is 1.
The title to put on top.
